TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XmlILStorageConverter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an internal class that provides static helper methods that get a value converter from <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime"> to convert among several physical common language runtime (CLR) representations for the same logical XML type.

Docs.summary: Converts a Boolean value to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue>.
